programme.desc: The daughter of an Air Force captain and the daughter of a widower hatch a plan to bring their single parents together.

programme.desc: Cleo Morelli, an aspiring Portland chef, tries to win a food truck competition. When a handsome chef from a rival food truck parks across the street from her, Cleo's goal to win takes a spicy turn.

programme.title: A Picture of Her
programme.desc: After becoming the subject of an award-winning magazine cover, a woman embarks on a quest to uncover the true identity of the photographer who snapped her photo.

programme.title: Winter in Vail
programme.desc: A Los Angeles event coordinator learns that her estranged uncle has recently passed away and left her a chalet in Vail, Colo.

programme.title: Pearl in Paradise
programme.desc: A nature photographer heads to Fiji to shoot a magazine cover. She enlists the help of a romance novelist who she's convinced can help her locate a rare blue pearl.

programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.desc: The housemates could earn $100,000 if they adopt an elderly pig.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Courtesy of their new housekeeper's magic potions, Blanche's social life perks up and Dorothy wins the battle against insomnia.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The women confront their phobias on a flight to the Bahamas to attend a funeral.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, concerned about the nuclear arms race, mails letters to President Reagan and Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev.

programme.title: The Perfect Bride
programme.desc: Fitness instructor Molly runs the Bridal Boot Camp, helping prospective brides-to-be get in shape for the big day. Things get complicated when sparks start to fly between herself and Nick, the fiance of one of her new clients.

programme.title: Harvest Love
programme.desc: A widowed surgeon visits her family's pear orchard in hopes of taking a break from her hectic life and reconnecting with her distant son. Once there, she begins to fall for the farm manager, Will, who is growing a new hybrid pear.

programme.title: My One & Only
programme.desc: Contestants on "The One" try to determine if they're fated to be together. Meanwhile, sparks fly between the female contestant and the handsome ranch owner who acts as their guide.

programme.title: Taking the Reins
programme.desc: A writer returns to her family ranch where she discovers what ended her marriage and why she stopped riding horses.
